title: European Parliament Revolutionizes Archive Access with Claude AI \ Anthropic

metadata.title: European Parliament Revolutionizes Archive Access with Claude AI \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how the European Parliament uses Anthropic's Claude AI to power Archibot, dramatically improving access to 2.1 million documents. Learn how this AI solution cuts search time by 80% and boosts user satisfaction, while maintaining ethical standards and security.
